div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1700 Luxor (Birabi), 1915-1916 Burial: c. 200 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 157 AE. Pot hoard from excava- tions Ptolemy II: 3+ (as Svoronos 412) Ptolemy III: 9+ (as Sv. 964-5, 974, 992-3) Ptolemy IV: 3+ (as Sv. 1166-7, 1169) Disposition: formerly New York (MMA) now dispersed Photos of the 15 coins detailed above on file in ANS
